verses.verse: In <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh, I take <S%H2620>refuge.<s%> Let me <S%H408>never<s%> be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%> <S%H6403>Deliver<s%> me in your <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

Bow <S%H5186>down<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H5337>me.<s%> Deliver me <S%H4120>speedily.<s%> Be to me a <S%H4581>strong<s%> <S%H6697>rock,<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4686>defense<s%> to save <S%H3467>me.<s%>
For you are my <S%H5553>rock<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress,<s%> therefore for your <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake <S%H5148>lead<s%> me and guide <S%H5148>me.<s%>
Pluck me <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2098>that<s%> they have laid <S%H2934>secretly<s%> for <S%H4581>me,<s%> for you are my stronghold.
Into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> I <S%H6485>commend<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit.<s%> You <S%H6299>redeem<s%> <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H571>truth.<s%>
I <S%H8130>hate<s%> those who <S%H8104>regard<s%> <S%H7723>lying<s%> <S%H1892>vanities,<s%> but I <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

I will be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in your loving <S%H2617>kindness,<s%> for you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction.<s%> You have <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H6869>adversities.<s%>
You have not shut me <S%H5462>up<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy.<s%> You have <S%H5975>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in a large <S%H4800>place.<s%>

Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> on <S%H3068>me,<s%> Yahweh, for I am in <S%H6887>distress.<s%> My <S%H5869>eye,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and my <S%H990>body<s%> <S%H6244>waste<s%> away with <S%H3708>grief.<s%>

For my <S%H2416>life<s%> is <S%H3615>spent<s%> with <S%H3015>sorrow,<s%> my <S%H8141>years<s%> with <S%H585>sighing.<s%> My <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H3782>fails<s%> because of my <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%> My <S%H6106>bones<s%> are wasted <S%H6244>away.<s%>

Because of all my <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> I have become utterly <S%H2781>contemptible<s%> to my <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> <S%H3966><s%> A <S%H6343>fear<s%> to my <S%H3045>acquaintances.<s%> Those who <S%H7200>saw<s%> me <S%H2351>on<s%> the street fled from <S%H5074>me.<s%>
I am <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> from their <S%H3820>hearts<s%> like a dead <S%H4191>man.<s%> I am like <S%H6>broken<s%> <S%H3627>pottery.<s%>

For I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1681>slander<s%> of <S%H7227>many,<s%> <S%H4032>terror<s%> on every <S%H5439>side,<s%> while they <S%H3245>conspire<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> against <S%H2161>me,<s%> they plot to take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H5315>life.<s%>
But I <S%H982>trust<s%> in <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh. I <S%H559>said,<s%> "You are my <S%H430>God.<s%>"
My <S%H6256>times<s%> are in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%> <S%H5337>Deliver<s%> me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H341>enemies,<s%> and from those who persecute <S%H7291>me.<s%>
Make your <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> on your <S%H5650>servant.<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> me in your loving <S%H2617>kindness.<s%>

Let me not be <S%H954>disappointed,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for I have <S%H7121>called<s%> on <S%H7563>you.<s%> Let the wicked be <S%H954>disappointed.<s%> Let them be <S%H1826>silent<s%> in <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>

Let the <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> be <S%H481>mute,<s%> which <S%H1696>speak<s%> against the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6277>insolently,<s%> with <S%H1346>pride<s%> and <S%H937>contempt.<s%>

Oh how <S%H7227>great<s%> is your <S%H2898>goodness,<s%> which you have laid <S%H6845>up<s%> for those who <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H6466>you,<s%> which you have worked for those who take <S%H2620>refuge<s%> in <S%H1121>you,<s%> before the sons of <S%H120>men!<s%>

In the <S%H5643>shelter<s%> of your <S%H6440>presence<s%> you will <S%H5641>hide<s%> them from the <S%H7407>plotting<s%> of <S%H376>man.<s%> You will keep them <S%H6845>secretly<s%> in a <S%H5521>dwelling<s%> away from the <S%H7379>strife<s%> of <S%H3956>tongues.<s%>
<S%H1288>Praise<s%> be to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for he has shown me his <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> in a <S%H4692>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%>

As for <S%H559>me,<s%> I said in my <S%H2648>haste,<s%> "I am cut <S%H1629>off<s%> from <S%H5048>before<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>" <S%H403>Nevertheless<s%> you <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>petitions<s%> when I cried to <S%H7768>you.<s%>

Oh <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> all you his <S%H2623>saints!<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5341>preserves<s%> the <S%H539>faithful,<s%> and <S%H3499>fully<s%> <S%H7999>recompenses<s%> him who <S%H6213>behaves<s%> <S%H1346>arrogantly.<s%>
Be <S%H553>strong,<s%> and let your <S%H3824>heart<s%> take <S%H2388>courage,<s%> all you who <S%H3176>hope<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
